CTA.TITLE: Join Our Campaign
CTA.CONTENT:
Help make valuable educational resources available to people in your community. Join this campaign to localize the { CURRICULUM_MODULE_NAME } module of our Web Literacy Curriculum.
There will be special gifts for the first 20 participants!

CAMPAIGN_INFO.TITLE: About the Campaign
CAMPAIGN_INFO.CONTENT_1: In an effort to teach the web to a global audience, Mozilla is excited to launch a campaign to continue localizing its curriculum, this time the { CURRICULUM_MODULE_NAME } module. With the support of the community the campaign hopes to conclude with the module translated and localized in a total of 12 languages.
